item.title: First Post
item.description: So this is the first post on my new Data portfolio. Phew what a journey! This blog has spent over eight months on my to do list. But now it is alive! So let’s try and recap everything so far. Why am I here? How did I get here? And where to from here? Well I am Elleni. I am, and for the past 10 years have been a photographer. I run my own business/businesses here:
